author: Florent De Bortoli
text: Esterel is the best for Jagger Bomb ! ;)

author: Thomas Diaconu
text: Certainly one of the best restaurants of the region

author: Florent De Bortoli
text: Perfect place to have a nice view over Monaco

author: Thomas Bonomo
text: It's too cold at the top of the hill, and the weather was bad...

author: Antoine Meresse
text: It's impressive to see the sea at one side and snow-covered summits of the Alpes at the other side.

author: Antoine Lapoul
text: I don't like the music there and there wasn't any beer at the end of the party :(

author: Thomas Diaconu
text: Nice beach to have fun ! Never tried the ice-cream there... :D

author: Elise Bouvais
text: Very interesting museum with a wonderful aquarium

author: Florent De Bortoli
text: I've been to this ski station for the first time with my year group and we spent a wonderful weekend. The skiing area is quite big.

author: Florent De Bortoli
text: This pub is often overcrowded especially during the weekend and the ground is really dirty, but they propose some quite tasty beers.

author: Florent De Bortoli
text: Indeed this club is tiny but the sound system is incredible, which enables DJs to mix really nice sets of Tech-House.

author: Florent De Bortoli
text: High Club is big and well located, it benefits from a huge dancefloor and music is good. There isn't any selection of people at the entrance so you don't need to bring your best outfit.

author: Florent De Bortoli
text: I ate an wonderful sea perch at the Galion, the place and the food is really sofisticated. Sure you'll get your money's worth.

author: Florent De Bortoli
text: That's perfect for eating affordable Italian food made of only fresh products in front of the sea, and the service is fast.

author: Florent De Bortoli
text: It's so exausting to reach this vantage in Mandelieu, but it's worthwhile. However, it's quite difficult to access by car because the car park is a bit far.

author: Florent De Bortoli
text: The ski station is usually closed because there is not enough snow, indeed the station's altitude is too low. The skiing area is too small. The landscape is beautiful.
